http://www.w3.org/2000/01/rdf-schema#lab: Kaloi Limenes, 'Good Ports', today a small LPG terminal well protected from northern winds, one wonders just why the captain of St Paul's ship preferred to winter at Phoenix rather than here: perhaps he did not realise that the coast between Matala and Frangokastello is subject to northern wind gusts due to the topography of the coastal mountain ridge … Foundation
